current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to eliminate the taxable income limit on percentage depletion for oil and natural gas produced from marginal properties.

sponsor.#tail: introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the

header.#text:
Elimination of taxable income
			 limit on percentage depletion for oil and natural gas produced from marginal
			 properties

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
is amended to read as
			 follows:

external-xref.#tail: of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
shall not apply to so much of
				the allowance for depletion as is determined under

header.#text:
Nonapplication
				of taxable income limit with respect to marginal production

text.#text:
The amendment made by this section shall apply to taxable
			 years beginning after December 31, 2013.

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}title.#text: 113 S1833 IS: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to eliminate the taxable income limit on percentage depletion for oil and natural gas produced from marginal properties.
